definition: area in Beichuan county Sichuan
to exaggerate/empty/in vain/old variant of 螗[tang2]
Tang dynasty (618-907)/surname Tang

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 傢伙|家伙[jia1 huo5]
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: The aim of the army is the Tangjiashan quake lake located at the upper reaches of the Beichuan County.
sentences.chinese: 部队的目标，是位于北川县城上游的唐家山堰塞湖。

sentences.english: Xinhua says the water level in Tangjiashan lake is half drained.
sentences.chinese: 新华社还说，唐家山堰塞湖的水位降低了一半。

sentences.english: Rescue teams on top of the Tangjiashan quake lake dam are using solar power to illuminate the site.
sentences.chinese: 唐家山堰塞湖坝顶抢险部队用太阳能照明。

sentences.english: Rescuers are ready to dynamite Tangjiashan barrier lake.
sentences.chinese: 救援者已准备好炸破唐家山堰塞湖。

sentences.english: Museum visitors will be able to access the Tangjiashan Earthquake Lake by cable car.
sentences.chinese: 参观博物馆的游客可乘坐缆车到达唐家山地震湖区。

definition: (dialect) strip of land between hills/used in place names/also pr. [ya4]
dam/dike/embankment/CL:條|条[tiao2]
Longtan or Lungtan township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
a depression/cavity/hollow
variant of 坳[ao4]
Beichuan Qiang autonomous county in Mianyang 綿陽|绵阳[Mian2 yang2], north Sichuan
Hanwang town in Mianzhu county, Deying 德阳 prefecture, Sichuan
Lushan county in Ya'an 雅安[Ya3 an1], Sichuan
Mashan district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
Luding county (Tibetan: lcags zam rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
Longan district of Anyang city 安陽市|安阳市[An1 yang2 shi4], Henan
abbr. for 五峰土家族自治縣|五峰土家族自治县[Wu3 feng1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4], Wufeng Tujia Autonomous County in Hubei
Pingzhen or Pingchen city in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
Mabian Yizu autonomous county in Leshan 樂山|乐山[Le4 shan1], Sichuan
Fuxing or Fuhsing township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
to draw a bamboo bow or crossbow
Muchuan county in Leshan 樂山|乐山[Le4 shan1], Sichuan
